attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want via this Petition to obtain compensation also large very LARGE fines to be implemented against Credit Reference Agencys,also company's from all walks of life,who allow or put FALSE information on a citizen's credit file,also wrong information about individual citizens,the process takes far far too long to RECTIFY and the gross inconvenience for MILLIONS of citizens of the UK is unacceptable the Heartache and suffering caused by these people is under no cicumstances to be allowed ANY LONGER.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.Also, please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
